memberdef.name: DATAMANAGERCOLUMN_GETCOL
memberdef.initializer: { \ Vector<T>& vec = static_cast<Vector<T>&>(arr); \ rownr_t nr = vec.nelements(); \ rownr_t rownr = 0; \ while (rownr < nr) { \ aips_name2(get,T) (rownr, &vec[rownr]); \ rownr++; \ if (rownr <= colCache_p.end() && rownr > colCache_p.start()) { \ rownr_t last = std::min(nr-1, colCache_p.end()); \ rownr_t inx = (rownr - colCache_p.start()) * colCache_p.incr(); \ const T* cptr = static_cast<const T*>(colCache_p.dataPtr()) + inx; \ for (rownr_t j=rownr; j<=last; ++j) { \ vec[rownr++] = *cptr; \ cptr += colCache_p.incr(); \ } \ } \ } \ }

memberdef.name: DATAMANAGERCOLUMN_PUTCOL
memberdef.initializer: { \ const Vector<T>& vec = static_cast<const Vector<T>&>(arr); \ rownr_t nr = vec.nelements(); \ for (rownr_t rownr=0; rownr<nr; ++rownr) { \ aips_name2(put,T) (rownr, &vec[rownr]); \ } \ }

memberdef.name: DATAMANAGERCOLUMN_PUTCELLS
memberdef.initializer: { \ const Vector<T>& vec = static_cast<const Vector<T>&>(arr); \ RefRowsSliceIter iter(rownrs); \ rownr_t i=0; \ while (! iter.pastEnd()) { \ rownr_t rownr = iter.sliceStart(); \ rownr_t end = iter.sliceEnd(); \ rownr_t incr = iter.sliceIncr(); \ while (rownr <= end) { \ aips_name2(put,T) (rownr, &(vec[i])); \ i++; \ rownr += incr; \ } \ iter++; \ } \ }
